lines.text: Oh great Poseidon! Punish them! Show them your might! Aaaarghhh!
Ulysse... Ulysse... don't destroy the universe...
Go on! Escape! We will cover you!
Nestor! Companions! No, stop! Without the light of the Cyclops they are quite harmless!
Disgrace is upon us! The great Cyclops is dead! The revenge of the gods will be terrible!
It is the 31st Century. Ulysses killed the giant Cyclops when he rescued the children and his son Telemachus. But the ancient gods of Olympus are angry and threaten a terrible revenge...
